xml.head: Test File
xml.author: Elisa Beshero-Bondar
xml.p: Here's a file I'm bouncing around on GitHub. I am writing it on a Mac.

I'm going to send it to the Sandbox on my DH-ClassHub, after I save it with a colon in its file name. What happens when someone on a PC pulls it in? How will the file name be altered as it moves? Note: I'm going to have to use command line mv to change the file name so it has a colon in it.
